attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Door staff all over the UK forced out of work due to the sia not providing the service we need and what was meant to provide. The main problems are: waiting times, cost of the licence, the process & the waiting times on there premium rate number we have to ring to hear them say the same thing month after month.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
